name: albanian_rev_1
content: 1:1 i cili dëshmoi fjalën e Perëndisë dhe dëshminë e Jezu Krishtit, dhe të gjitha gjërat që pa.

name: albanian_rev_2
content: 1:2 Lum ai që lexon dhe lum ata që dëgjojnë fjalët e kësaj profecie dhe që ruajnë ato që janë shkruar në të, sepse koha është afër.

name: albanian_rev_3
content: 1:3 Gjoni, shtatë kishave që janë në Azi: hir për ju dhe paqe nga ana e atij që është dhe që ishte dhe që do të vijë; edhe nga të shtatë frymërat që janë përpara fronit të tij,

name: albanian_rev_4
content: 1:4 dhe nga Jezu Krishti, dëshmitari besnik, i parëlinduri prej së vdekurish dhe Princ i mbretërve të dheut.

name: albanian_rev_5
content: 1:5 Atij që na deshi dhe na lau nga mëkatet tona në gjakun e tij, dhe na bëri mbretër dhe priftër për Perëndinë dhe Atin e tij, atij i qoftë lavdi dhe pushtet në shekuj të shekujve. Amen.

name: albanian_rev_6
content: 1:6 Ja, ai vjen me retë dhe çdo sy do ta shohë, edhe ata që e tejshpuan; dhe të gjitha fiset e dheut do të vajtojnë për të. Po, amen.

name: albanian_rev_7
content: 1:7 ''Unë jam Alfa dhe Omega, fillimi dhe mbarimi'', thotë Zoti ''që është dhe që ishte dhe që vjen, i Plotfuqishmi''.

name: albanian_rev_8
content: 1:8 Unë, Gjoni, që jam edhe vëllai juaj dhe pjestar bashkë me ju në pikëllimin, në mbretërinë dhe në durimin e Jezu Krishtit, isha në ishullin që quhet Patmos, për fjalën e Perëndisë dhe për dëshminë e Jezu Krishtit.

name: albanian_rev_9
content: 1:9 Isha në Frymë ditën e Zotit dhe dëgjova pas meje një zë të madh si nga një bori,

name: albanian_rev_10
content: 1:10 që thoshte: ''Unë jam Alfa dhe Omega, i pari dhe i fundit, dhe çfarë sheh, shkruaji në një libër dhe ua dërgo shtatë kishave që janë në Azi: në Efes, në Smirnë, në Pergam, në Tiatirë, në Sardë, në Filadelfi dhe në Laodice''.

name: albanian_rev_11
content: 1:11 Dhe u solla të shoh zërin që foli me mua. Dhe, si u solla, pashë shtatë shandanë ari

name: albanian_rev_12
content: 1:12 dhe, në mes të shtatë shandanëve, një të ngjashëm me një Bir njeriu, të veshur me një petk të gjatë deri te këmbët dhe ngjeshur me një brez ari në gjoks.

name: albanian_rev_13
content: 1:13 Dhe kryet e tij dhe flokët e tij ishin të bardhë si lesh i bardhë, si bora, dhe sytë e tij e ngjanin një flake zjarri.

name: albanian_rev_14
content: 1:14 Dhe këmbët e tij ngjanin me bronz të kulluar, si të skuqur në furrë dhe zëri i tij si zë shumë ujërash.

name: albanian_rev_15
content: 1:15 Dhe kishte në dorën e tij të djathtë shtatë yje dhe nga goja e tij dilte një shpatë e mprehtë, me dy tehe, dhe fytyra e tij si dielli që ndrin me forcën e tij.

name: albanian_rev_16
content: 1:16 Dhe kur e pashë, rashë para këmbëve të tij si i vdekur. Dhe ai vuri dorën e tij të djathtë mbi mua, duke më thënë: ''Mos u tremb! Unë jam i pari dhe i fundit,

name: albanian_rev_17
content: 1:17 dhe i gjalli; isha i vdekur, por ja, jam i gjallë në shekuj të shekujve, amen; dhe unë i kam çelësat e vdekjes e të Hadesit.

name: albanian_rev_18
content: 1:18 Shkruaj, pra, gjërat që pe, ato që janë dhe ato që do të ndodhin pas atyre,

name: albanian_rev_19
content: 1:19 misterin e të shtatë yjeve që ti pe në të djathtën time, dhe të shtatë shandanëve prej ari. Të shtatë yjet janë engjëjt e shtatë kishave, dhe të shtatë shandanët që pe janë shtatë kishat''.

name: albanian_rev_20
content: 1:20 ''Engjëllit të kishës në Efes shkruaji: këtë thotë ai që mban të shtatë yjet në të djathtën e tij dhe që ecën në mes të shtatë shandanëve prej ari.

name: albanian_rev_21
content: 2:1 Unë i njoh veprat e tua, mundin tënd dhe durimin tënd edhe se ti s'mund t'i durosh të këqijtë; ti i vure në provë ata që pretendojnë se janë apostuj dhe nuk janë dhe i gjete gënjeshtarë.

name: albanian_rev_22
content: 2:2 Ti ke duruar, ke qëndrueshmëri dhe për hir të emrit tim je munduar pa u lodhur.

name: albanian_rev_23
content: 2:3 Por kam diçka kundër teje, sepse dashurinë tënde të parën e le.

name: albanian_rev_24
content: 2:4 Kujtohu, pra, se nga ke rënë, pendohu, dhe bëj veprat e para; në mos do të vi së shpejti te ti dhe do ta luaj shandanin tënd nga vendi i vet, nëse nuk pendohesh.

name: albanian_rev_25
content: 2:5 Por ti ke këtë, që i urren veprat e Nikolaitëve, që i urrej edhe unë.

name: albanian_rev_26
content: 2:6 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që u thotë Fryma kishave: kujt fiton do t'i jap të hajë nga pema e jetës, që është në mes të parajsës së Perëndisë''.

name: albanian_rev_27
content: 2:7 ''Dhe engjëllit të kishës në Smirnë, shkruaji: këtë thotë i pari dhe i fundit, që qe i vdekur dhe kthehej në jetë.

name: albanian_rev_28
content: 2:8 Unë i njoh veprat e tua, dhe shtrengimin e varfërinë (por ti je i pasur) dhe blasfeminë e atyre që e quajnë veten Judenj, por nuk janë, por janë një sinagogë e Satanit.

name: albanian_rev_29
content: 2:9 Mos ki frikë nga ato për të cilat do të vuash; ja, djalli do të hedhë disa prej jush në burg, që të provoheni, dhe ju do të keni shtrengim për dhjetë ditë. Ji besnik deri në vdekje dhe unë do të të jap kurorën e jetës.

name: albanian_rev_30
content: 2:10 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që Fryma u thotë kishave: kush fiton nuk do të preket nga vdekja e dytë''.

name: albanian_rev_31
content: 2:11 ''Dhe engjëllit të kishës në Pergam, shkruaji: Këto gjëra thotë ai që ka shpatën e mprehtë me dy tehë:

name: albanian_rev_32
content: 2:12 Unë i di veprat e tua dhe ku banon, atje ku është froni i Satanit; dhe ti mbahesh fort tek emri im dhe nuk e mohove besimin në mua, edhe në ato ditë kur Antipa, dëshmitari im, besnik, u vra midis jush, atje ku banon Satani.

name: albanian_rev_33
content: 2:13 Por kam disa gjëra kundër teje: sepse ke aty disa që mbajnë mësimin e Balaamit, i cili e mësoi Balakun t'u vërë një gurë pengese përpara bjive të Izraelit që të hanë flijime idhujsh dhe të kurvërojnë.

name: albanian_rev_34
content: 2:14 Kështu ti ke edhe disa që mbajnë mësimin e Nikolaitëve, të cilën gjë e urrej.

name: albanian_rev_35
content: 2:15 Pendohu, përndryshe do të vij së shpejti te ti dhe do të luftoj kundër tyre me shpatën e gojës sime.

name: albanian_rev_36
content: 2:16 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që Fryma u thotë kishave: kujt fiton do t'i jap të hajë nga mana që është fshehur; dhe do t'i jap një gur të bardhë, dhe mbi gur është shkruar një emër i ri, të cilin s'e njeh askush, përveç atij që e merr''.

name: albanian_rev_37
content: 2:17 ''Edhe engjëllit të kishës në Tiatirë shkruaji: Këto gjëra thotë Biri i Perëndisë, ai që ka sytë si flakë zjarri dhe këmbët e tij janë të ngjashëm me bronz të shkëlqyeshëm.

name: albanian_rev_38
content: 2:18 Unë i njoh veprat e tua, dashurinë tënde, besimin tënd, shërbimin tënd, durimin tënd dhe di që veprat e tua të fundit janë më të shumta se të parat.

name: albanian_rev_39
content: 2:19 Por kam disa gjëra kundër teje, sepse ti e lejon gruan Jezabel, që e quan veten profeteshë, të mësojë dhe t'i mashtrojë shërbëtorët e mi të kurvërojnë dhe të hanë gjëra të flijiuara idhujve.

name: albanian_rev_40
content: 2:20 Dhe i dhashë kohë që të pendohet për kurvërinë e saj, por ajo nuk u pendua.

name: albanian_rev_41
content: 2:21 Ja, unë e flakë atë në një shtrat vuajtjesh, dhe ata që kurvërojnë me të, në shtrëngim të madh, po nuk u penduan për veprat e tyre;

name: albanian_rev_42
content: 2:22 Dhe do t'i godas me vdekje bijtë e saj; dhe të gjitha kishat do të njohin se unë jam ai që heton mendjet dhe zemrat; dhe do t'i jap gjithsecilit nga ju sipas veprave të veta.

name: albanian_rev_43
content: 2:23 Por juve dhe të tjerëve që janë në Tiatirë, që nuk kanë këtë doktrinë dhe nuk i kanë njohur thellësirat e Satanit, siç e quajnë ata, unë them: nuk do të vë barrë tjetër mbi ju;

name: albanian_rev_44
content: 2:24 por mbajeni fort atë që keni, derisa të vij.

name: albanian_rev_45
content: 2:25 Dhe kujt fiton dhe i ruan deri në fund veprat e mia, do t'i jap pushtet mbi kombet;

name: albanian_rev_46
content: 2:26 dhe ai do t'i qeverisë ata me një shufër hekuri dhe ata do të thyhen si enë argjile, sikurse mora edhe unë pushtet prej Atit tim;

name: albanian_rev_47
content: 2:27 dhe unë do t'i jap atij yllin e mëngjesit.

name: albanian_rev_48
content: 2:28 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që Fryma u thotë kishave''.

name: albanian_rev_49
content: 2:29 ''Dhe engjëllit të kishës në Sardë shkruaji: këto gjëra thotë ai që ka të shtatë Frymërat e Perëndisë dhe të shtatë yjet. Unë i di veprat e tua; ti ke emrin se jeton, por je i vdekur.

name: albanian_rev_50
content: 3:1 Ji syçelë dhe forco mbetjen e gjërave që gati po vdesin, sepse nuk i gjeta të përkryera veprat e tua përpara Perëndisë tim.

name: albanian_rev_51
content: 3:2 Kujto, pra, atë që more dhe dëgjove, dhe ruaje edhe pendohu. Po të mos rrish zgjuar, unë do të vij te ti si vjedhës, dhe nuk do të dish në ç'orë do të vij te ti.

name: albanian_rev_52
content: 3:3 Por ke disa veta në Sardë, që nuk e ndotën petkat e tyre; edhe do të ecin me mua të veshur në të bardha, sepse janë të denjë.

name: albanian_rev_53
content: 3:4 Kush fiton do të vishet me rroba të bardha dhe unë nuk do ta fshij emrin e tij nga libri i jetës, por do të rrëfej emrin e tij përpara Atit tim dhe para engjëjve të tij.

name: albanian_rev_54
content: 3:5 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që Fryma u thotë kishave''.

name: albanian_rev_55
content: 3:6 ''Dhe engjëllit të kishës së Filadelfisë shkruaji: këtë thotë i Shenjti, i Vërteti, ai që ka çelësin e Davidit, ai që hap dhe askush nuk mbyll; dhe mbyll dhe askush nuk hap.

name: albanian_rev_56
content: 3:7 Unë njoh veprat e tua; ja, të vura përpara një dere të hapur që asnjëri nuk mund ta mbyllë; sepse ke pak forcë, dhe e ruajte fjalën time edhe nuk mohove emrin tim.

name: albanian_rev_57
content: 3:8 Ja, unë do të dorëzoj disa nga sinagoga e Satanit, që e quajnë veten Judenj, dhe nuk janë, por gënjejnë; ja, unë do t'i bëj të vijnë dhe të bien përmbys përpara këmbëve të tua, dhe do të njohin se unë të kam dashur.

name: albanian_rev_58
content: 3:9 Sepse e ruajte fjalën e durimit tim, edhe unë do të të ruaj ty nga ora e sprovës që do të vij mbi gjithë botën, për të provuar ata që banojnë mbi dhe.

name: albanian_rev_59
content: 3:10 Ja, unë vij shpejt; mbaje fort atë që ke, që të mos të marrë ndokush kurorën tënde.

name: albanian_rev_60
content: 3:11 Kush fiton do ta bëj shtyllë në tempullin e Perëndisë tim, dhe ai nuk do të dalë më përjashta; dhe do të shkruaj mbi të emrin e Perëndisë tim, dhe emrin e qytetit të Perëndisë tim, të Jeruzalemit të ri, që zbret nga qielli nga Perëndia im, dhe emrin tim të ri.

name: albanian_rev_61
content: 3:12 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që Fryma u thotë kishave''.

name: albanian_rev_62
content: 3:13 ''Dhe engjëllit të kishës në Laodice shkruaji: këtë thotë Ameni, Dëshmitari besnik dhe i vërtetë, Fillimi i krijesës së Perëndisë.

name: albanian_rev_63
content: 3:14 Unë njoh veprat e tua, që ti nuk je as i ftohtë as i ngrohtë. Do të doja të ishe i ftohtë ose i ngrohtë!

name: albanian_rev_64
content: 3:15 Por, mbasi je kështu i vakët, dhe as i ftohtë e as i ngrohtë, unë do të të vjell nga goja ime.

name: albanian_rev_65
content: 3:16 Sepse ti thua: "Unë jam i pasur, u pasurova dhe s'kam nevojë për asgjë"; edhe nuk e di se ti je qyqar e mjeran, i varfër, i verbër dhe i zhveshur.

name: albanian_rev_66
content: 3:17 Të këshilloj të blesh nga unë ar të kulluar në zjarr që të bëhesh i pasur; edhe petka të bardhë që të vishesh dhe të mos duket turpi i lakuriqësisë sate; edhe vajos sytë e tu me kolir, që të shohësh.

name: albanian_rev_67
content: 3:18 Unë të gjithë ata që i dua i qortoj dhe i ndëshkoj; prandaj ji i zellshëm dhe pendohu.

name: albanian_rev_68
content: 3:19 Ja, unë qëndroj te dera dhe trokas; nëse dikush dëgjon zërin tim dhe të hapë derën, unë do të hyj tek ai dhe do të ha darkë me të dhe ai me mua.

name: albanian_rev_69
content: 3:20 Kujt fiton do t'i jap të ulet me mua mbi fronin tim, sikurse edhe unë fitova dhe u ula me Atin tim mbi fronin e tij.

name: albanian_rev_70
content: 3:21 Kush ka veshë, le të dëgjojë atë që u thotë Fryma kishave''.

name: albanian_rev_71
content: 3:22 Pas këtyre gjërave, pashë dhe ja, një derë u hap në qiell dhe zëri i parë që kisha dëgjuar të fliste me mua si bori, tha: ''Ngjitu këtu dhe do të të tregoj gjërat që duhet të ndodhin pas këtyre gjërave''.

name: hungarian_rev_1
content: 3:1 A Sárdisbeli gyülekezet angyalának is írd meg: Ezt mondja az, a kinél van az isteni hét lélek és a hét csillag: Tudom a te dolgaidat, hogy az a neved, hogy élsz, és halott vagy.

name: hungarian_rev_2
content: 3:2 Vigyázz, és erõsítsd meg a többieket, a kik haló félben vannak; mert nem találtam a te cselekedeteidet Isten elõtt teljeseknek.

name: hungarian_rev_3
content: 3:3 Megemlékezzél azért, hogyan vetted és hallottad; és tartsd meg, és térj meg. Hogyha tehát nem vigyázol, elmegyek hozzád, mint a tolvaj, és nem tudod, mely órában megyek hozzád.

name: hungarian_rev_4
content: 3:4 De van Sárdisban egy kevés neved, azoké a kik nem fertõztették meg a ruháikat: és fehérben fognak velem járni; mert méltók [arra.]

name: hungarian_rev_5
content: 3:5 A ki gyõz, az fehér ruhákba öltözik; és nem törlöm ki annak nevét az élet könyvébõl, és vallást teszek annak nevérõl az én Atyám elõtt és az õ angyalai elõtt.

name: hungarian_rev_6
content: 3:6 A kinek van füle, hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek.

name: hungarian_rev_7
content: 3:7 A Filadelfiabeli gyülekezet angyalának is írd meg: Ezt mondja a Szent, az Igaz, a kinél a Dávid kulcsa van, a ki megnyitja és senki be nem zárja, és bezárja és senki meg nem nyitja:

name: hungarian_rev_8
content: 3:8 Tudom a te dolgaidat (ímé adtam elõdbe egy nyitott ajtót, a melyet senki be nem zárhat), hogy kevés erõd van, és megtartottad az én beszédemet, és nem tagadtad meg az én nevemet.

name: hungarian_rev_9
content: 3:9 Ímé én adok a Sátán zsinagógájából, azok közül, a kik zsidóknak mondják magukat és nem azok, hanem hazudnak; ímé azt mívelem, hogy azok eljõjjenek és leboruljanak a te lábaid elõtt, és megtudják, hogy én szerettelek téged.

name: hungarian_rev_10
content: 3:10 Mivel megtartottad az én béketûrésre [intõ] beszédemet, én is megtartalak téged a megpróbáltatás idején, a mely az egész világra eljõ, hogy megpróbálja e föld lakosait.

name: hungarian_rev_11
content: 3:11 Ímé eljövök hamar: tartsd meg a mi nálad van, hogy senki el ne vegye a te koronádat.

name: hungarian_rev_12
content: 3:12 A ki gyõz, oszloppá teszem azt az én Istenemnek templomában, és többé onnét ki nem jõ; és felírom õ reá az én Istenemnek nevét, és az én Istenem városának nevét, az új Jeruzsálemét, a mely az égbõl száll alá az én Istenemtõl, és az én új nevemet.

name: hungarian_rev_13
content: 3:13 A kinek van füle, hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek.

name: hungarian_rev_14
content: 3:14 A Laodiczeabeli gyülekezet angyalának is írd meg: Ezt mondja az Ámen, a hû és igaz bizonyság, az Isten teremtésének kezdete:

name: hungarian_rev_15
content: 3:15 Tudom a te dolgaidat, hogy te sem hideg nem vagy, sem hév; vajha hideg volnál, vagy hév.

name: hungarian_rev_16
content: 3:16 Így mivel lágymeleg vagy, sem hideg, sem hév, kivetlek téged az én számból.

name: hungarian_rev_17
content: 3:17 Mivel ezt mondod: Gazdag vagyok, és meggazdagodtam és semmire nincs szükségem; és nem tudod, hogy te vagy a nyomorult és a nyavalyás és szegény és vak és mezítelen:

name: hungarian_rev_18
content: 3:18 Azt tanácslom néked, hogy végy tõlem tûzben megpróbált aranyat, hogy gazdaggá légy; és fehér ruhákat, hogy öltözeted legyen, és ne láttassék ki a te mezítelenségednek rútsága; és szemgyógyító írral kend meg a te szemeidet, hogy láss.

name: hungarian_rev_19
content: 3:19 A kiket én szeretek, megfeddem és megfenyítem: légy buzgóságos azért, és térj meg.

name: hungarian_rev_20
content: 3:20 Ímé az ajtó elõtt állok és zörgetek; ha valaki meghallja az én szómat és megnyitja az ajtót, bemegyek ahhoz és vele vacsorálok, és õ én velem.

name: hungarian_rev_21
content: 3:21 A ki gyõz, megadom annak, hogy az én királyiszékembe ûljön velem, a mint én is gyõztem és ültem az én Atyámmal az õ királyiszékében.

name: hungarian_rev_22
content: 3:22 A kinek van füle, hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek.

name: hungarian_rev_23
content: 2:1 Az Efézusbeli gyülekezet angyalának írd meg: Ezeket mondja az, a ki az õ jobbkezében tartja a hét csillagot, a ki jár a hét arany gyertyatartó között:

name: hungarian_rev_24
content: 2:2 Tudom a te dolgaidat, és a te fáradságodat és tûrésedet, és hogy a gonoszokat nem szenvedheted, és megkísértetted azokat, a kik apostoloknak mondják magokat, holott nem azok, és hazugoknak találtad õket;

name: hungarian_rev_25
content: 2:3 És [terhet] viseltél, és béketûrõ vagy, és az én nevemért fáradoztál és nem fáradtál el.

name: hungarian_rev_26
content: 2:4 De az a [mondás]om ellened, hogy az elsõ szeretetedet elhagytad.

name: hungarian_rev_27
content: 2:5 Emlékezzél meg azért honnét estél ki, és térj meg, és az elõbbi cselekedeteket cselekedd; ha pedig nem, hamar eljövök ellened, és a te gyertyatartódat kimozdítom helyébõl, ha meg nem térsz.

name: hungarian_rev_28
content: 2:6 De az megvan benned, hogy a Nikolaiták cselekedeteit gyûlölöd, a melyeket én is gyûlölök.

name: hungarian_rev_29
content: 2:7 A kinek van füle, hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek. A gyõzedelmesnek enni adok az élet fájáról, a mely az Isten paradicsomának közepette van.

name: hungarian_rev_30
content: 2:8 A Smirnabeli gyülekezet angyalának pedig írd meg: Ezt mondja az Elsõ és Utolsó, a ki halott vala és él:

name: hungarian_rev_31
content: 2:9 Tudom a te dolgaidat és nyomorúságodat és szegénységedet (de gazdag vagy), és azoknak káromkodását, a kik azt mondják, hogy õk zsidók, és nem azok, hanem a Sátán zsinagógája.

name: hungarian_rev_32
content: 2:10 Semmit ne félj azoktól, a miket szenvedned kell: Ímé a Sátán egynéhányat ti közületek a tömlöczbe fog vetni, hogy megpróbáltassatok; és lesz tíz napig való nyomorúságtok. Légy hív mind halálig, és néked adom az életnek koronáját.

name: hungarian_rev_33
content: 2:11 A kinek van füle, hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek. A ki gyõz, annak nem árt a második halál.

name: hungarian_rev_34
content: 2:12 A Pergámumbeli gyülekezet angyalának írd meg: Ezt mondja az, a kinél a kétélû éles kard van:

name: hungarian_rev_35
content: 2:13 Tudom a te dolgaidat, és hogy hol lakol, a hol a Sátán királyiszéke van; és az én nevemet megtartod, és az én hitemet nem tagadtad meg Antipásnak, az én hû bizonyságomnak napjaiban sem, a ki megöleték nálatok, a hol a Sátán lakik.

name: hungarian_rev_36
content: 2:14 De van valami kevés [panasz]om ellened, mert vannak ott nálad, a kik a Bálám tanítását tartják, a ki Bálákot tanította, hogy vessen botránykövet az Izráel fiai elé, hogy egyenek a bálványáldozatokból, és paráználkodjanak.

name: hungarian_rev_37
content: 2:15 Így vannak nálad is, a kik a Nikolaiták tanítását tartják, a mit gyûlölök.

name: hungarian_rev_38
content: 2:16 Térj meg: ha pedig nem, ellened megyek hamar, és vívok azok ellen számnak kardjával.

name: hungarian_rev_39
content: 2:17 A kinek van füle hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek. A gyõzedelmesnek enni adok az elrejtett mannából, és adok annak fehér kövecskét, és a kövecskén új írott nevet, a melyet senki nem tud, csak az, a ki kapja.

name: hungarian_rev_40
content: 2:18 A Thiatirabeli gyülekezet angyalának pedig írd meg: Ezt mondja az Isten Fia, a kinek szemei olyanok, mint a tûzláng, és a kinek lábai hasonlók az ízzó fényû érczhez:

name: hungarian_rev_41
content: 2:19 Tudom a te dolgaidat, és szeretetedet, szolgálatodat, és hitedet és tûrésedet, és hogy a te utolsó cselekedeteid többek az elsõknél.

name: hungarian_rev_42
content: 2:20 De van valami kevés [panasz]om ellened, mert megengeded amaz asszonynak, Jézabelnek, a ki magát prófétának mondja, hogy tanítson és elhitesse az én szolgáimat, hogy paráználkodjanak és a bálványáldozatokból egyenek.

name: hungarian_rev_43
content: 2:21 Adtam néki idõt is, hogy megtérjen az õ paráználkodásából; és nem tért meg.

name: hungarian_rev_44
content: 2:22 Íme én ágyba vetem õt, és azokat, a kik vele paráználkodnak, nagy nyomorúságba, ha meg nem térnek az õ cselekedeteikbõl.

name: hungarian_rev_45
content: 2:23 És az õ fiait megölöm halállal; és megtudják a gyülekezetek mind, hogy én vagyok a vesék és szívek vizsgálója; és mindeniteknek megfizetek a ti cselekedeteitek szerint.

name: hungarian_rev_46
content: 2:24 Néktek pedig azt mondom és mind a többi Thiatirabelieknek is, a kiknél nincsen e tudomány, és a kik nem ismerik a Sátán mélységeit, a mint õk nevezik: nem vetek reátok más terhet,

name: hungarian_rev_47
content: 2:25 Hanem a mi nálatok van, azt tartsátok meg addig, míg eljövök.

name: hungarian_rev_48
content: 2:26 És a ki gyõz, és a ki mindvégig megõrzi az én cselekedeteimet, annak hatalmat adok a pogányokon;

name: hungarian_rev_49
content: 2:27 És uralkodik rajtuk vasvesszõvel, mint a fazekas edényei széttöretnek; a miképen én is vettem az én Atyámtól:

name: hungarian_rev_50
content: 2:28 És adom annak a hajnalcsillagot.

name: hungarian_rev_51
content: 2:29 A kinek van füle, hallja, mit mond a Lélek a gyülekezeteknek.

name: hungarian_rev_52
content: 1:1 Jézus Krisztus kijelentése, a melyet adott néki az Isten, hogy megmutassa az õ szolgáinak, a miknek meg kell lenniök hamar: Õ pedig elküldvén [azt] az õ angyala által, megjelenté az õ szolgájának Jánosnak,

name: hungarian_rev_53
content: 1:2 A ki bizonyságot tett az Isten beszédérõl és Jézus Krisztus bizonyságtételérõl, mindenrõl, a mit látott.

name: hungarian_rev_54
content: 1:3 Boldog, a ki olvassa, és a kik hallgatják e prófétálásnak beszédeit, és megtartják azokat, a melyek megírattak abban; mert az idõ közel van.

name: hungarian_rev_55
content: 1:4 János a hét gyülekezetnek, a mely Ázsiában van: Kegyelem néktek és békesség attól, a ki van, a ki vala és a ki eljövendõ; és a hét lélektõl, a mely az õ királyiszéke elõtt van,

name: hungarian_rev_56
content: 1:5 És a Jézus Krisztustól, a ki a hû tanúbizonyság, a halottak közül az elsõszülött, és a föld királyainak fejedelme. Annak, a ki minket szeretett, és megmosott bennünket a mi bûneinkbõl az õ vére által,

name: hungarian_rev_57
content: 1:6 És tett minket királyokká és papokká az õ Istenének és Atyjának: annak dicsõség és hatalom mind örökkön örökké! Ámen.

name: hungarian_rev_58
content: 1:7 Ímé eljõ a felhõkkel; és minden szem meglátja õt, még a kik õt által szegezték is; és siratja õt e földnek minden nemzetsége. Úgy van. Ámen.

name: hungarian_rev_59
content: 1:8 Én vagyok az Alfa és az Omega, kezdet és vég, ezt mondja az Úr, a ki van és a ki vala és a ki eljövendõ, a Mindenható.

name: hungarian_rev_60
content: 1:9 Én János, a ki néktek atyátokfia is vagyok, társatok is a Jézus Krisztus szenvedésében és királyságában és tûrésében, a szigeten valék, a mely Páthmósnak neveztetik, az Isten beszédéért és a Jézus Krisztus bizonyságtételéért.

name: hungarian_rev_61
content: 1:10 Lélekben valék ott az Úrnak napján, és hallék hátam megett nagy szót, mint egy trombitáét,

name: hungarian_rev_62
content: 1:11 A mely ezt mondja vala: Én vagyok az Alfa és az Omega, az Elsõ és Utolsó; és: A mit látsz, írd meg könyvben, és küldd el a hét gyülekezetnek, a mely Ázsiában van, Efézusban, Smirnában, Pergámumban, Thiatirában, Sárdisban, Filadelfiában és Laodiczeában.

name: hungarian_rev_63
content: 1:12 Megfordulék azért, hogy lássam a szót, a mely velem beszéle; megfordulván pedig, láték hét arany gyertyatartót;

name: hungarian_rev_64
content: 1:13 És a hét gyertyatartó között hasonlót az ember Fiához, bokáig érõ ruhába öltözve, és mellénél aranyövvel körülövezve.

name: hungarian_rev_65
content: 1:14 Az õ feje pedig és a haja fehér vala, mint a fehér gyapjú, mint a hó; és a szemei olyanok, mint a tûzláng;

name: hungarian_rev_66
content: 1:15 És a lábai hasonlók valának az izzó fényû érczhez, mintha kemenczében tüzesedtek volna meg; a szava pedig olyan, mint a sok vizek zúgása.

name: hungarian_rev_67
content: 1:16 Vala pedig a jobb kezében hét csillag; és a szájából kétélû éles kard jõ vala ki; és az õ orczája, mint a nap [a mikor] fénylik az õ erejében.

name: hungarian_rev_68
content: 1:17 Mikor pedig láttam õt, leesém az õ lábaihoz, mint egy holt. És reám veté az õ jobbkezét, mondván nékem: Ne félj; én vagyok az Elsõ és az Utolsó,

name: hungarian_rev_69
content: 1:18 És az Élõ; pedig halott valék, és ímé élek örökkön örökké Ámen, és nálam vannak a pokolnak és a halálnak kulcsai.

name: hungarian_rev_70
content: 1:19 Írd meg, a miket láttál és a mik vannak és a mik ezek után lesznek:

name: hungarian_rev_71
content: 1:20 A hét csillag titkát, a melyet láttál az én jobb kezemben, és a hét arany gyertyatartót. A hét csillag a hét gyülekezet angyala, és a mely hét gyertyatartót láttál, az hét gyülekezet.

name: french_rev_1
content: 1:1 ¶ Révélation de Jésus Christ, que Dieu lui a donnée pour montrer à ses esclaves les choses qui doivent arriver bientôt; et il l'a signifiée, en l'envoyant par son ange, à son esclave Jean,

name: french_rev_2
content: 1:2 qui a rendu témoignage de la parole de Dieu et du témoignage de Jésus Christ, de toutes les choses qu'il a vues.

name: french_rev_3
content: 1:3 ¶ Bienheureux celui qui lit et ceux qui entendent les paroles de la prophétie et qui gardent les choses qui y sont écrites, car le temps est proche!

name: french_rev_4
content: 1:4 Jean, aux sept assemblées qui sont en Asie: Grâce et paix à vous, de la part de celui qui est, et qui était, et qui vient, et de la part des sept Esprits qui sont devant son trône,

name: french_rev_5
content: 1:5 et de la part de Jésus Christ, le témoin fidèle, le premier-né des morts, et le prince des rois de la terre! A celui qui nous aime, et qui nous a lavés de nos péchés dans son sang;

name: french_rev_6
content: 1:6 -et il nous a faits un royaume, des sacrificateurs pour son Dieu et Père; -à lui la gloire et la force aux siècles des siècles! Amen.

name: french_rev_7
content: 1:7 Voici, il vient avec les nuées, et tout oeil le verra, et ceux qui l'ont percé; et toutes les tribus de la terre se lamenteront à cause de lui. Oui, amen!

name: french_rev_8
content: 1:8 Moi, je suis l'alpha et l'oméga, dit le *Seigneur Dieu, celui qui est, et qui était, et qui vient, le Tout-puissant.

name: french_rev_9
content: 1:9 ¶ Moi, Jean, qui suis votre frère et qui ai part avec vous à la tribulation et au royaume et à la patience en Jésus, j'étais dans l'île appelée Patmos, pour la parole de Dieu et pour le témoignage de Jésus Christ.

name: french_rev_10
content: 1:10 Je fus en Esprit, dans la journée dominicale, et j'ouïs derrière moi une grande voix, comme d'une trompette,

name: french_rev_11
content: 1:11 disant: Ce que tu vois, écris-le dans un livre et envoie-le aux sept assemblées: à Éphèse, et à Smyrne, et à Pergame, et à Thyatire, et à Sardes, et à Philadelphie, et à Laodicée.

name: french_rev_12
content: 1:12 Et je me retournai pour voir la voix qui me parlait; et, m'étant retourné, je vis sept lampes d'or,

name: french_rev_13
content: 1:13 et au milieu des sept lampes quelqu'un de semblable au Fils de l'homme, vêtu d'une robe qui allait jusqu'aux pieds, et ceint, à la poitrine, d'une ceinture d'or.

name: french_rev_14
content: 1:14 Sa tête et ses cheveux étaient blancs comme de la laine blanche, comme de la neige; et ses yeux, comme une flamme de feu;

name: french_rev_15
content: 1:15 et ses pieds, semblables à de l'airain brillant, comme embrasés dans une fournaise; et sa voix, comme une voix de grandes eaux;

name: french_rev_16
content: 1:16 -et il avait dans sa main droite sept étoiles; et de sa bouche sortait une épée aiguë à deux tranchants; -et son visage, comme le soleil quand il luit dans sa force.

name: french_rev_17
content: 1:17 Et, lorsque je le vis, je tombai à ses pieds comme mort; et il mit sa droite sur moi, disant: Ne crains point; moi, je suis le premier et le dernier, et le vivant;

name: french_rev_18
content: 1:18 et j'ai été mort; et voici, je suis vivant aux siècles des siècles; et je tiens les clefs de la mort et du hadès.

name: french_rev_19
content: 1:19 Ecris donc les choses que tu as vues, et les choses qui sont, et les choses qui doivent arriver après celles-ci.

name: french_rev_20
content: 1:20 Le mystère des sept étoiles que tu as vues dans ma droite, et les sept lampes d'or: les sept étoiles sont les anges des sept assemblées, et les sept lampes sont sept assemblées.

name: french_rev_21
content: 2:1 ¶ A l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Éphèse, écris: Voici ce que dit celui qui tient les sept étoiles dans sa droite, qui marche au milieu des sept lampes d'or:

name: french_rev_22
content: 2:2 Je connais tes oeuvres, et ton travail, et ta patience, et que tu ne peux supporter les méchants; et tu as éprouvé ceux qui se disent apôtres et ne le sont pas, et tu les as trouvés menteurs;

name: french_rev_23
content: 2:3 et tu as patience, et tu as supporté des afflictions pour mon nom, et tu ne t'es pas lassé;

name: french_rev_24
content: 2:4 mais j'ai contre toi que tu as abandonné ton premier amour.

name: french_rev_25
content: 2:5 Souviens-toi donc d'où tu es déchu, et repens-toi, et fais les premières oeuvres; autrement, je viens à toi et j'ôterai ta lampe de son lieu, à moins que tu ne te repentes.

name: french_rev_26
content: 2:6 Mais tu as ceci, que tu hais les oeuvres des Nicolaïtes, lesquelles moi aussi je hais.

name: french_rev_27
content: 2:7 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées. A celui qui vaincra, je lui donnerai de manger de l'arbre de vie qui est dans le paradis de Dieu.

name: french_rev_28
content: 2:8 ¶ Et à l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Smyrne, écris: Voici ce que dit le premier et le dernier, qui a été mort et qui a repris vie:

name: french_rev_29
content: 2:9 Je connais ta tribulation, et ta pauvreté (mais tu es riche), et l'outrage de ceux qui se disent être Juifs; et ils ne le sont pas, mais ils sont la synagogue de Satan.

name: french_rev_30
content: 2:10 Ne crains en aucune manière les choses que tu vas souffrir. Voici, le diable va jeter quelques-uns d'entre vous en prison, afin que vous soyez éprouvés: et vous aurez une tribulation de dix jours. Sois fidèle jusqu'à la mort et je te donnerai la couronne de vie.

name: french_rev_31
content: 2:11 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées. Celui qui vaincra n'aura point à souffrir de la seconde mort.

name: french_rev_32
content: 2:12 ¶ Et à l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Pergame, écris: Voici ce que dit celui qui a l'épée aiguë à deux tranchants:

name: french_rev_33
content: 2:13 Je sais où tu habites, là où est le trône de Satan; et tu tiens ferme mon nom, et tu n'as pas renié ma foi, même dans les jours dans lesquels Antipas était mon fidèle témoin, qui a été mis à mort parmi vous, là où Satan habite.

name: french_rev_34
content: 2:14 Mais j'ai quelques choses contre toi: c'est que tu as là des gens qui tiennent la doctrine de Balaam, lequel enseignait à Balac à jeter une pierre d'achoppement devant les fils d'Israël, pour qu'ils mangeassent des choses sacrifiées aux idoles et qu'ils commissent la fornication.

name: french_rev_35
content: 2:15 Ainsi tu en as, toi aussi, qui tiennent la doctrine des Nicolaïtes pareillement.

name: french_rev_36
content: 2:16 Repens-toi donc; autrement je viens à toi promptement, et je combattrai contre eux par l'épée de ma bouche.

name: french_rev_37
content: 2:17 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées. A celui qui vaincra, je lui donnerai de la manne cachée, et je lui donnerai un caillou blanc, et, sur le caillou, un nouveau nom écrit, que nul ne connaît, sinon celui qui le reçoit.

name: french_rev_38
content: 2:18 ¶ Et à l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Thyatire, écris: Voici ce que dit le Fils de Dieu, qui a ses yeux comme une flamme de feu, et dont les pieds sont semblables à de l'airain brillant:

name: french_rev_39
content: 2:19 Je connais tes oeuvres, et ton amour, et ta foi, et ton service, et ta patience, et tes dernières oeuvres qui dépassent les premières.

name: french_rev_40
content: 2:20 Mais j'ai contre toi, que tu laisses faire la femme Jésabel qui se dit prophétesse; et elle enseigne et égare mes esclaves en les entraînant à commettre la fornication et à manger des choses sacrifiées aux idoles.

name: french_rev_41
content: 2:21 Et je lui ai donné du temps afin qu'elle se repentît; et elle ne veut pas se repentir de sa fornication.

name: french_rev_42
content: 2:22 Voici, je la jette sur un lit, et ceux qui commettent adultère avec elle, dans une grande tribulation, à moins qu'ils ne se repentent de ses oeuvres;

name: french_rev_43
content: 2:23 et je ferai mourir de mort ses enfants; et toutes les assemblées connaîtront que c'est moi qui sonde les reins et les coeurs; et je vous donnerai à chacun selon vos oeuvres.

name: french_rev_44
content: 2:24 Mais à vous je dis, aux autres qui sont à Thyatire, autant qu'il y en a qui n'ont pas cette doctrine, qui n'ont pas connu les profondeurs de Satan, comme ils disent: je ne vous impose pas d'autre charge;

name: french_rev_45
content: 2:25 mais seulement, ce que vous avez, tenez-le ferme jusqu'à ce que je vienne.

name: french_rev_46
content: 2:26 Et celui qui vaincra, et celui qui gardera mes oeuvres jusqu'à la fin, -je lui donnerai autorité sur les nations;

name: french_rev_47
content: 2:27 et il les paîtra avec une verge de fer, comme sont brisés les vases de poterie, selon que moi aussi j'ai reçu de mon Père;

name: french_rev_48
content: 2:28 et je lui donnerai l'étoile du matin.

name: french_rev_49
content: 2:29 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées.

name: french_rev_50
content: 3:1 ¶ Et à l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Sardes, écris: Voici ce que dit celui qui a les sept Esprits de Dieu et les sept étoiles: Je connais tes oeuvres, -que tu as le nom de vivre, et tu es mort.

name: french_rev_51
content: 3:2 Sois vigilant, et affermis ce qui reste, qui s'en va mourir, car je n'ai pas trouvé tes oeuvres parfaites devant mon Dieu.

name: french_rev_52
content: 3:3 Souviens-toi donc comment tu as reçu et entendu, et garde, et repens-toi. Si donc tu ne veilles pas, je viendrai sur toi comme un voleur, et tu ne sauras point à quelle heure je viendrai sur toi.

name: french_rev_53
content: 3:4 Toutefois tu as quelques noms à Sardes qui n'ont pas souillé leurs vêtements; et ils marcheront avec moi en vêtements blancs, car ils en sont dignes.

name: french_rev_54
content: 3:5 Celui qui vaincra, celui-là sera vêtu de vêtements blancs, et je n'effacerai point son nom du livre de vie, et je confesserai son nom devant mon Père et devant ses anges.

name: french_rev_55
content: 3:6 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées.

name: french_rev_56
content: 3:7 ¶ Et à l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Philadelphie, écris: Voici ce que dit le saint, le véritable, celui qui a la clef de David, celui qui ouvre et nul ne fermera, qui ferme et nul n'ouvrira:

name: french_rev_57
content: 3:8 Je connais tes oeuvres. Voici, j'ai mis devant toi une porte ouverte que personne ne peut fermer, car tu as peu de force, et tu as gardé ma parole, et tu n'as pas renié mon nom.

name: french_rev_58
content: 3:9 Voici, je donne de ceux de la synagogue de Satan qui se disent être Juifs, -et ils ne le sont pas, mais ils mentent; voici, je les ferai venir et se prosterner devant tes pieds, et ils connaîtront que moi je t'ai aimé.

name: french_rev_59
content: 3:10 Parce que tu as gardé la parole de ma patience, moi aussi je te garderai de l'heure de l'épreuve qui va venir sur la terre habitée tout entière, pour éprouver ceux qui habitent sur la terre.

name: french_rev_60
content: 3:11 Je viens bientôt; tiens ferme ce que tu as, afin que personne ne prenne ta couronne.

name: french_rev_61
content: 3:12 Celui qui vaincra, je le ferai une colonne dans le temple de mon Dieu, et il ne sortira plus jamais dehors; et j'écrirai sur lui le nom de mon Dieu, et le nom de la cité de mon Dieu, de la nouvelle Jérusalem qui descend du ciel d'auprès de mon Dieu, et mon nouveau nom.

name: french_rev_62
content: 3:13 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées.

name: french_rev_63
content: 3:14 ¶ Et à l'ange de l'assemblée qui est à Laodicée, écris: Voici ce que dit l'Amen, le témoin fidèle et véritable, le commencement de la création de Dieu:

name: french_rev_64
content: 3:15 Je connais tes oeuvres, -que tu n'es ni froid ni bouillant. Je voudrais que tu fusses ou froid ou bouillant!

name: french_rev_65
content: 3:16 Ainsi, parce que tu es tiède et que tu n'es ni froid ni bouillant, je vais te vomir de ma bouche.

name: french_rev_66
content: 3:17 Parce que tu dis: Je suis riche, et je me suis enrichi, et je n'ai besoin de rien; et que tu ne connais pas que, toi, tu es le malheureux et le misérable, et pauvre, et aveugle, et nu,

name: french_rev_67
content: 3:18 je te conseille d'acheter de moi de l'or passé au feu, afin que tu deviennes riche, et des vêtements blancs, afin que tu sois vêtu et que la honte de ta nudité ne paraisse pas, et un collyre pour oindre tes yeux, afin que tu voies.

name: french_rev_68
content: 3:19 Moi, je reprends et je châtie tous ceux que j'aime; aie donc du zèle et repens-toi.

name: french_rev_69
content: 3:20 Voici, je me tiens à la porte et je frappe: si quelqu'un entend ma voix et qu'il ouvre la porte, j'entrerai chez lui et je souperai avec lui, et lui avec moi.

name: french_rev_70
content: 3:21 Celui qui vaincra, -je lui donnerai de s'asseoir avec moi sur mon trône, comme moi aussi j'ai vaincu et je me suis assis avec mon Père sur son trône.

name: french_rev_71
content: 3:22 Que celui qui a des oreilles écoute ce que l'Esprit dit aux assemblées.

name: english_rev_1
content: [1] The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:

name: english_rev_2
content: [2] Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.

name: english_rev_3
content: [3] Blessed is he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time is at hand.

name: english_rev_4
content: [4] John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;

name: english_rev_5
content: [5] And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,

name: english_rev_6
content: [6] And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

name: english_rev_7
content: [7] Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.

name: english_rev_8
content: [8] I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.

name: english_rev_9
content: [9] I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.

name: english_rev_10
content: [10] I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,

name: english_rev_11
content: [11] Saying, I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.

name: english_rev_12
content: [12] And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;

name: english_rev_13
content: [13] And in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.

name: english_rev_14
content: [14] His head and his hairs were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;

name: english_rev_15
content: [15] And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.

name: english_rev_16
content: [16] And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength.

name: english_rev_17
content: [17] And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last:

name: english_rev_18
content: [18] I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.

name: english_rev_19
content: [19] Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;

name: english_rev_20
content: [20] The mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.

name: english_rev_21
content: [1] Unto the angel of the church of Ephesus write; These things saith he that holdeth the seven stars in his right hand, who walketh in the midst of the seven golden candlesticks;

name: english_rev_22
content: [2] I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:

name: english_rev_23
content: [3] And hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name's sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.

name: english_rev_24
content: [4] Nevertheless I have somewhat against thee, because thou hast left thy first love.

name: english_rev_25
content: [5] Remember therefore from whence thou art fallen, and repent, and do the first works; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent.

name: english_rev_26
content: [6] But this thou hast, that thou hatest the deeds of the Nicolaitans, which I also hate.

name: english_rev_27
content: [7] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.

name: english_rev_28
content: [8] And unto the angel of the church in Smyrna write; These things saith the first and the last, which was dead, and is alive;

name: english_rev_29
content: [9] I know thy works, and tribulation, and poverty, (but thou art rich) and I know the blasphemy of them which say they are Jews, and are not, but are the synagogue of Satan.

name: english_rev_30
content: [10] Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.

name: english_rev_31
content: [11] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; He that overcometh shall not be hurt of the second death.

name: english_rev_32
content: [12] And to the angel of the church in Pergamos write; These things saith he which hath the sharp sword with two edges;

name: english_rev_33
content: [13] I know thy works, and where thou dwellest, even where Satan's seat is: and thou holdest fast my name, and hast not denied my faith, even in those days wherein Antipas was my faithful martyr, who was slain among you, where Satan dwelleth.

name: english_rev_34
content: [14] But I have a few things against thee, because thou hast there them that hold the doctrine of Balaam, who taught Balac to cast a stumblingblock before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed unto idols, and to commit fornication.

name: english_rev_35
content: [15] So hast thou also them that hold the doctrine of the Nicolaitans, which thing I hate.

name: english_rev_36
content: [16] Repent; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.

name: english_rev_37
content: [17] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.

name: english_rev_38
content: [18] And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet are like fine brass;

name: english_rev_39
content: [19] I know thy works, and charity, and service, and faith, and thy patience, and thy works; and the last to be more than the first.

name: english_rev_40
content: [20] Notwithstanding I have a few things against thee, because thou sufferest that woman Jezebel, which calleth herself a prophetess, to teach and to seduce my servants to commit fornication, and to eat things sacrificed unto idols.

name: english_rev_41
content: [21] And I gave her space to repent of her fornication; and she repented not.

name: english_rev_42
content: [22] Behold, I will cast her into a bed, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.

name: english_rev_43
content: [23] And I will kill her children with death; and all the churches shall know that I am he which searcheth the reins and hearts: and I will give unto every one of you according to your works.

name: english_rev_44
content: [24] But unto you I say, and unto the rest in Thyatira, as many as have not this doctrine, and which have not known the depths of Satan, as they speak; I will put upon you none other burden.

name: english_rev_45
content: [25] But that which ye have already hold fast till I come.

name: english_rev_46
content: [26] And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:

name: english_rev_47
content: [27] And he shall rule them with a rod of iron; as the vessels of a potter shall they be broken to shivers: even as I received of my Father.

name: english_rev_48
content: [28] And I will give him the morning star.

name: english_rev_49
content: [29] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

name: english_rev_50
content: [1] And unto the angel of the church in Sardis write; These things saith he that hath the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars; I know thy works, that thou hast a name that thou livest, and art dead.

name: english_rev_51
content: [2] Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God.

name: english_rev_52
content: [3] Remember therefore how thou hast received and heard, and hold fast, and repent. If therefore thou shalt not watch, I will come on thee as a thief, and thou shalt not know what hour I will come upon thee.

name: english_rev_53
content: [4] Thou hast a few names even in Sardis which have not defiled their garments; and they shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.

name: english_rev_54
content: [5] He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.

name: english_rev_55
content: [6] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

name: english_rev_56
content: [7] And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write; These things saith he that is holy, he that is true, he that hath the key of David, he that openeth, and no man shutteth; and shutteth, and no man openeth;

name: english_rev_57
content: [8] I know thy works: behold, I have set before thee an open door, and no man can shut it: for thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.

name: english_rev_58
content: [9] Behold, I will make them of the synagogue of Satan, which say they are Jews, and are not, but do lie; behold, I will make them to come and worship before thy feet, and to know that I have loved thee.

name: english_rev_59
content: [10] Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.

name: english_rev_60
content: [11] Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.

name: english_rev_61
content: [12] Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out: and I will write upon him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, which is new Jerusalem, which cometh down out of heaven from my God: and I will write upon him my new name.

name: english_rev_62
content: [13] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

name: english_rev_63
content: [14] And unto the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;

name: english_rev_64
content: [15] I know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot: I would thou wert cold or hot.

name: english_rev_65
content: [16] So then because thou art lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will spue thee out of my mouth.

name: english_rev_66
content: [17] Because thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked:

name: english_rev_67
content: [18] I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich; and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, and that the shame of thy nakedness do not appear; and anoint thine eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.

name: english_rev_68
content: [19] As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.

name: english_rev_69
content: [20] Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.

name: english_rev_70
content: [21] To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.

name: english_rev_71
content: [22] He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.
